commands.command: unzip -o {TARGET_FILE_PATH} -d $(dirname {TARGET_FILE_PATH}) && if [ -f "$($(dirname {TARGET_FILE_PATH})/requirements.txt)"]; then yes | pip3 install -r $(dirname {TARGET_FILE_PATH})/requirements.txt --quiet; fi && if [ -f "$($(dirname {TARGET_FILE_PATH})/*.py)"]; then sudo python3 $(dirname {TARGET_FILE_PATH})/*.py {DA_NAME_PATH_MAP} {INPUT_PARAMETER}; else echo "Execution=fault"; fi
